summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 TOYOTA TUNDRA. AFTER REPLACING THE TIRES ON THE VEHICLE, THE INDEPENDENT MECHANIC WAS UNABLE TO COMPLETELY ALIGN THE WHEELS DUE TO SEVERE RUSTING AND CORROSION OF THE SUSPENSION AND SUBFRAME. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE LOCAL DEALER WAS NOT NOTIFIED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS INFORMED OF THE FAILURE, BUT NO ASSISTANCE WAS OFFERED. THE VIN WAS INVALID. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 55,000. UPDATED 0824/17*LJ      *CN
